## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3f901e4dd7e04278583fb94f1b9054b6ec65d10b3afc74f95a256d7e9b423516)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'vscode-spring-initializr' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
